text: The men's hammer throw event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 18 September. A 7257g (senior implement) hammer was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Vadym Grabovoyy ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Alberto
